name: Mischievous Die
description:
A game in which you play as a mischievous die that decides the outcome of each roll. Who should win and who should lose? That is for you to decide.

Characters:

Mike, Rachel, Giorgio, and James.

Hints:

Hint #1

Mike and Rachel hooked together for that night

Hint #2

Giorgio doesn't mind if Mike hears his phone call.

Hint #3

James is a secret agent.
